desc: Bee numbers around the world are declining and unfortunately this is also the case for many species of insects. Bees Please by MBarnett Designs has created a way for bee lovers to take part in raising awareness for our Australian pollinators through the design and creation of bee accessories.

layout.text: It's Time To Save The Bees
Bees Please has created a way for you to take part in raising awareness for our Australian pollinators.
